# Publishing images to Docker Hub
[![GitHub Marketplace](https://img.shields.io/badge/Marketplace-Docker%20Hub%20Description-blue.svg?colorA=24292e&colorB=0366d6&style=flat&longCache=true&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/marketplace/actions/docker-hub-description)

A GitHub action to update a Docker Hub repository description from `README.md`.
This is useful if you `docker push` your images to Docker Hub. It provides an easy, automated way to keep your Docker Hub repository description in sync with your GitHub repository `README.md` file.
